Welcome to the MGA Cyberknights


The MGA Cyberknights are a student and alumni-led organization formed to further students’ understanding of Cybersecurity concepts and represent MGA in national and international cyber-related competitions.


Current or Upcoming Events

Stay up to date on any current or upcoming events! The Calendar will keep you informed regarding meetings, Capture the Flag Challenges, or any other special events. Plus, if you want to learn more about some of the results and highlights from past events or challenges, navigate to the Event Highlights page!

Capture the Flag Challenges

As mentioned above, the MGA Cyberknights take great pride in paticipating in and completing Capture the Flag Challenges. If you would like to learn more about what Capture the Flag Challenges are and some of the methods, tools, and techniques used in these challenges, check out the CTF Challenges page.


The Armory

Many CTF Challenges incorporate many different tools, programs, methods, and concepts from Information Technology, Cybersecurity, and Penetration Testing such as Metasploit, MSFvenom, Pivoting, Post-Exploitation, among many others. Therefore, we working on and compiling an expansive list of various links, Linux Distributions, and all-around helpful tools that anyone interested in Information Technology will find useful. We have aptly named that list The Armory.


Join the MGA Cyberknights,
TODAY!

If you would like to build connections with like minded people who share similar interests, are interested in competing in Capture the Flag Challenges and want to learn more about Cybersecurity and IT in general, join the MGA Cyberknights.

  • The option to compete in high-level competitions
  • No membership fees and no dues
  • Professional, academic, and alumni support
  • Be a part of an active community of IT Professionals and newcomers alike

The best way to get in touch with us is through the MGA Cyberknights Discord server, which serves as the main medium of communication outside of the weekly meetings. However, you can always send us an email through the Contact Us page.
